name: No.HazedHeart
description:
Introduction

Control the encounter and connect with love!
This game is a casual strategy game that requires players to overcome multiple challenges and connect with beautiful girls' hearts.
Players need to operate the two sides of the heart and guide them to reach the destination at the same time, in order to win the heart of the girl.

In the game, you need to use the terrain flexibly and adjust the position of the hearts.
Only by connecting with the beautiful girl's heart can you unlock a sweet encounter.
